abstract: Several start-ups are offering software for the iPhone and iPod Touch that filters out unsavory Web content.
snippet: Several start-ups are offering software for the iPhone and iPod Touch that filters out unsavory Web content.
lead_paragraph: The debate over supplying children with Apple iPhones might be heating up, but perhaps a more pressing concern is the level of access that kids already equipped with smartphones have to the rowdy world of the Web.

headline.main: Helping Parents Snoop on Kids’ iPhone Habits
